definition: to check/to examine/to inspect/to exercise restraint
tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
abbr. for 體格檢查|体格检查[ti3 ge2 jian3 cha2]
public prosecutor/public procurator (judicial officer whose job may involve both criminal investigation and public prosecution)
to overhaul/to examine and fix (a motor)/to service (a vehicle)

pinyin: Zui4 gao1 Ren2 min2 Jian3 cha2 yuan4

sentences.english: Click continue to proceed with checkout.
After approval of task card, the task card can be published instantly or set on time.
sentences.chinese: 除定检工作包外，系统还可以根据临时任务手动组包。

sentences.english: Diagnosis is made by direct and indirect ophthalmoscopy.
sentences.chinese: 通过直接和间接检眼镜观察即可作出诊断。

sentences.english: Ophthalmoscopy affords the only opportunity for direct visualization of blood vessels.
sentences.chinese: 检眼镜检查法提供直接观察血管的唯一机会。

sentences.english: Accurate tears localization with binocular indirect ophthalmoscope can increase successful rate.
sentences.chinese: 应用间接检眼镜直视下手术可大大提高手术成功率。

sentences.english: For more complicated procedures, scanning laser ophthalmoscopy is available.
sentences.chinese: 更加复杂的工具还有扫描激光检眼镜。

sentences.english: According to survey, 95% of female population in Mongolia is still unscreened.
sentences.chinese: 根据调查，95%的蒙古妇女仍然没做过筛检。

sentences.english: Put raw and subsidiary materials in the area to be inspected and label with "to be inspected".
sentences.chinese: 原辅料放入待检区，立即贴上待检标签。

sentences.english: Capital offenses ranged from gathering sticks on the Sabbath.
sentences.chinese: 死罪包括在安息日检柴禾。

sentences.english: For more items, you may search over the Library Catalogue.
sentences.chinese: 更多项目，可到图书馆目錄检索。

definition: abbr. for 產前檢查|产前检查[chan3 qian2 jian3 cha2]
chemical examination/to do a lab test
to take blood/to draw blood (e.g. for a test)
to do a blood test/to have one's blood tested
